description: A young Viking befriends a dragon, challenging his village’s traditions.
A hacker discovers a simulated reality and joins a rebellion to free humanity.
A struggling comedian descends into madness, becoming a chaotic symbol of rebellion.
A former wrestler trains his daughters to become world-class wrestling champions.

movie_title: The Curious Case of Benjamin Button
description: A man ages backward, experiencing love and life in reverse.
A thief infiltrates dreams to steal secrets, facing a mind-bending heist.
A small-town cricketer rises to become India’s legendary cricket captain.
A mistaken lunch delivery sparks an unexpected connection between two strangers.
An aspiring actress and a jazz musician chase dreams and love in Los Angeles.
A young girl navigates a magical world to save her parents from a curse.
A couple attends an exclusive dining experience that turns darkly surreal.
Modern and past love stories intertwine, exploring the complexities of romance.
A reclusive teacher reconnects with his daughter while facing personal struggles.
A young cinematographer learns to embrace life through therapy and personal connections.
A billionaire genius builds a high-tech suit to fight evil and redeem his past.
A vigilante hero faces a chaotic criminal mastermind threatening Gotham.
A man with a pure heart experiences decades of American history through love and chance.
College rivals compete in a series of challenges, sparking friendships and romance.
A widowers daughter schemes to reunite him with his college sweetheart.
Two Indian revolutionaries forge a bond to fight British colonial rule.
A brilliant mathematician battles schizophrenia while making groundbreaking contributions to game theory.
An Indian spy falls in love while on a high-stakes mission against a rival agent.
Superheroes unite to reverse a cosmic catastrophe and restore balance to the universe.

A stuttering king overcomes his fears with help from an unorthodox therapist.
A boy ventures into the Land of the Dead to uncover his familys musical legacy.

A fading singer mentors a talented young woman, leading to love and tragedy amidst fame.
A free-spirited woman navigates a love triangle between passion and stability.
A college student creates a social media empire, facing betrayal and lawsuits.
A young man survives a shipwreck, sharing a lifeboat with a Bengal tiger.

A terminally ill man secretly plays matchmaker for his friend and her neighbor.
A dyslexic child finds his potential through an inspiring art teacher.
A tale of unrequited love and heartbreak unfolds among three friends.
A rookie bunny cop and a fox con artist solve a mystery in a vibrant animal city.

A lonely writer develops an emotional relationship with an AI operating system.
Three superheroes team up to save the universe from a cosmic threat.
A Sikh soldier leads a small unit in a heroic stand against overwhelming odds.
Rival magicians obsessively compete, spiraling into deception and tragedy.
A young warrior uncovers his royal heritage and battles to reclaim his kingdom.

A spy races to secure a dangerous technology threatening global security.

Two teenagers mysteriously swap bodies, uncovering a deeper connection.

Two strangers evolve from rivals to lovers through chance encounters over years.
A physicist leads the development of the atomic bomb during World War II.

A secret agent manipulates time to prevent a catastrophic global event.
A mafia patriarch passes power to his reluctant son amid family and rivalry.
A boy embarks on a fantastical journey to cope with grief and loss.
A kidnapped woman finds freedom and self-discovery during a road trip with her captor.
A carefree man reconnects with an old flame, rekindling dreams and romance.
A doll embarks on a whimsical journey from her perfect world to the real one, discovering identity and purpose.
